import React from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, Image, NavDropdown} from "react-bootstrap" import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.user) const {userinfo} = userLogin return (
ProShop
Cart {userinfo ? ( Profile ) : Sign In}
) } export default Header
